CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(TEXT(Ratings__c) = '0', "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF(TEXT(Ratings__c) = '1', "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(TEXT(Ratings__c) = '2', "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(TEXT(Ratings__c) = '3', "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(TEXT(Ratings__c) = '4', "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF(TEXT(Ratings__c) = '5', "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "/img/samples/stars_000.gif" )))))), 'Rating Level')
CustomField.label: Ratings
